soulWeapon.advancement0:
Summons the soul of Prism Nova, Arc lumineir for 10 sec. For the duration of the Skill, the soul attack according to the Light Chrisha owns every 3 sec.
'Red Light' - Attacks the enemy and deals ??? M.DMG that ignores DEF.
'Blue Light' - Attack all enemies, dealing ??? M.DMG and recovering all allies' 1 orb of Mana.
'Green Light' - Attacks 2 enemies, dealing ??? M.DMG and reducing targets ATK by 35% for 5 sec.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Reduces Skill Activation Requirement to 4 times.
soulWeapon.advancement2:
All effects will be enhanced.
[Red Light] - DMG increases by 50%.
[Blue Light] - Mana Recovery increases by 100%.
[Green Light] - ATK Reduction changes to 50%.
soulWeapon.activation: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.

skillInfo.name: Light of Annihilation

skills.dark: Increases Mana Cost by 1 and DMG by 100%.

skillInfo.name: Technomagic of the Empire
skillInfo.description: Increases ATK by ??? and ACC by 100 for all allies, and own normal attack effect changes according to the color of light owned. Red Light - Increases DMG of normal attack by 100%, and upon attack, reduces Cooldown of [Light of Annihilation] by 1 sec. Blue Light - Reduces DMG of normal attack by 50%, but deals DMG to the entire enemy. Targets take 30% increased M.DMG for 10 sec. Green Light - Reduces DMG of normal attack by 20%, but deals DMG to 2 enemies. Heal Rate of the target is reduced by 20% for 5 sec.

skills.light: Enhances the effect of Lights on normal attacks. Red Light: Changes Cooldown Reduction to 2 sec. Blue Light: Target takes 60% increased M.DMG. Green Light: Heal Rate Reduction is increased to 40%.
skills.dark: Increases the Range of normal attack by 20%.

profile.likes: Her Family, the knights, pride, creed and valor, chess, and smart people.
profile.dislikes: Those disgraceful to the Empire, and the enemies that threaten peace of the Empire.

background.story: Commander of Velchia, the proud Magic Knights of the Empire, and the Inquisitor working directly under the Emperor. It is her duty to eliminate corruption, rebels, and everything else that threatens the Empire. The people of the Empire praise her and think of her as a hero, a title she has never been eager to accept. As a daughter of the Van Nosenhill family, and as a soldier of the Empire, all that matters to her is fulfilling her duties.

itemIntroductions.weapon: One of the newly invented weapons of Magos Le'Flamme, the researching organization of the Empire. Akistra was developed to be a cannon with maximized killing power, whereas Arc Lumineir was made as a multi-purpose strategic weapon. Researchers, while studying to control the power of light, combined the attribute of a light-dispersing ore and the principle of Technomagic that has its roots in Elemental Magic, and came up with a brand new concept for an optical weapon.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Chrisha incessantly researched her weapon, Arc Lumineir. Her philosophy was that one cannot hope to defeat any enemy if one does not fully understand his/her weapon. Chrisha examined the blueprint she got from Magos Le'flamme, and wrote her own diary in-between. Then one day, she found another power that was sleeping inside Arc Lumineir. It was another light that even the researchers who developed Arc Lumineir did not mention. Chrisha was taken by surprise, but she quickly regained her calmness and realiued that she is the only one who can draw this new-found power.
'At last, i know for sure now that this is the weapon which only i can use. From now on, I will take you to all battles I fight, and use every single abilities you hold:'
After then, Arc Lumineir was reborn as a weapon that releases massive light containing three elemental magic.
treasures: A fine sword and the family treasure of the Van Nosenhill family. The Van Nosenhill family has been deemed noble for its production of many outstanding strategists and commanders since the first emperor's reign. Ever since the sword was bestowed upon the family by the first emperor, the leaders of Van Nosenhill have always carried it with them.

The inquisitor's plaque that the Emperor bestowed upon Chrisha. The silver wolf and the sword in its mouth symbolize authority and control, with which Chrisha could enact justice and chastise evil on behalf of the Emperor.

A ring bestowed upon the Commander of the Velchia Magic Knights. It represents the power and pride of the finest order of magic knights in the Empire. Knights also use the ring as a stamp while doing paper work.

The core of Arc Lumineir and a Mana source that disperses lights of certain wavelength. This mineral was a very powerful artifact to use elemental spells with, but it was not hard enough to withstand stronger magic. The technomagic of Magos Le'Flamme greatly enhanced its hardness, and now it is used as an optical weapon.
